machine_start_gcode:
G90 ; use absolute coordinates
M83 ; extruder relative mode
M140 S[bed_temperature_initial_layer] ; set final bed temp
M104 S190 ; set temporary nozzle temp to prevent oozing during homing
G4 S10 ; allow partial nozzle warmup

G28 ; Home all axes
M420 S1 Z2 ; Use mesh level upto 2 mm

G1 Z50 F240
G1 X2 Y10 F3000
M104 S[nozzle_temperature_initial_layer] ; set final nozzle temp
M190 S[bed_temperature_initial_layer] ; wait for bed temp to stabilize
M109 S[nozzle_temperature_initial_layer] ; wait for nozzle temp to stabilize

; Set cleaning height and reset extruder
G1 Z0.28 F240
G92 E0

; ---- Forward cleaning line (200 mm) ----   
; Extrude a 200 mm line from Y10 to Y210 (adjust E amount as needed)
G1 Y210 E10 F1500     

; ---- Top Tangent Circle (2 mm diameter) ----
; The circle is drawn to the right of the cleaning line so that its leftmost point is X2.3.
; Its center is (2.3 + 1.0, 210) = (3.3,210).
; The circle is drawn as two 180Â° arcs.
G2 X4.3 Y210 I1.0 J0 F1200 E0.4   ; First half: from (2.3,210) to (4.3,210)
G2 X2.3 Y210 I-1.0 J0 F1200 E0.4   ; Second half: back to (2.3,210)

; ---- Return cleaning line (200 mm) ----
; Extrude a 200 mm line from Y210 back to Y10
G1 X2.3 F5000
G92 E0 ; Reset extruder distance here
G1 Y100 E10 F1500

; ---- Second Tangent Circle at Bottom (Counterclockwise) ----
; Same circle geometry but drawn in reverse direction using G3.
G3 X4.3 Y100 I1.0 J0 F1200 E0.4   ; First half arc (counterclockwise)
G3 X2.3 Y100 I-1.0 J0 F1200 E0.4   ; Second half arc to complete the circle
G92 E0 ; Reset extruder distance here
name: Ender-3 V2 0.4 - Sprite Pro
